original_title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - Rip-Roaring Roller Coasters And All Access To Fun
overview: Join Jay, Elisha and Tyler on a huge adventure into fun. You'll brave some of the world's fastest roller coasters, learn how to fly on the circus trapeze, go backstage at a mega-rock concert, and even step into the ring with a real WCW wrestler.
title: Popular Mechanics For Kids - Rip-Roaring Roller Coasters And All Access To Fun
